alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 12:40AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Cobb, southeastern Carroll, central Douglas, northwestern Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1240 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Sweetwater Creek State Park to near Chattahoochee Hills to near Plant Wansley, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Newnan, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, East Point, Union City, College Park, Fairburn, Austell, Palmetto, Whitesburg, Chattahoochee Hills, Lithia Springs, Plant Yates, Sweet Auburn, Dunaway Gardens, Cascade Heights, Campbellton, Sandtown and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
